title: Radichio Coleslaw
steps: Slice and mix Radichio and Cabbage, top with sliced walnuts.
Smash garlic, add with mayonaise to sauce.
Add remaining ingredients to sauce to taste.

title: Yuzu Soba
steps: Add bonito and wakame to boiling water. Simmer until broth is fragrant and tasty. This is Dashi!
Zest Yuzu into a little bowl. Add olive oil.
Juice Yuzu into a medium bowl. Add Dashi and a splash of soy sauce to taste.
Pour broth over cooked soba noodles, top with chopped vegetables and yuzu oil.
